item.title: Why Iot System Description, SSN & IOT-Light based onthologies
item.description: Creating dictionaries of existing sensors and actuators, leverage their usage to extend their usages for intelligent ambiant systems. In this article we’ll cover the needs and benefits to setup such descriptions, and choosen tools to achieve ambiant and intelligent systems.
